text: We are going to have peace even if we have to fight for it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

text: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
author: Desmond Tutu

text: America is a Nation with a mission - and that mission comes from our most basic beliefs. We have no desire to dominate, no ambitions of empire. Our aim is a democratic peace - a peace founded upon the dignity and rights of every man and woman.
author: George W. Bush

text: Ours is a world of nuclear giants and ethical infants. We know more about war that we know about peace, more about killing that we know about living.
author: Omar N. Bradley

text: Character... is a habit, the daily choice of right over wrong it is a moral quality which grows to maturity in peace and is not suddenly developed on the outbreak of war.
author: Charles Wilson
